entity.name: Styling & customization
entity.description: CSS styling and customization issues.
entity.descriptionHtml: CSS styling and customization issues.
entity.descriptionClean: CSS styling and customization issues.

entity.name: Styling
entity.description: Issues around styling UA-generated UI, CSS not working in certain contexts, etc.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around styling UA-generated UI, CSS not working in certain contexts, etc.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around styling UA-generated UI, CSS not working in certain contexts, etc.

entity.name: UI Customization
entity.description: Issues around customizing the browser-provided UI, *beyond styling*, such as changing text, adding or removing controls, etc.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around customizing the browser-provided UI, beyond styling, such as changing text, adding or removing controls, etc.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around customizing the browser-provided UI, beyond styling, such as changing text, adding or removing controls, etc.

entity.name: Searchable select
entity.description: The lack of a built-in ability to search or filter the options within a `<select>` element.
entity.descriptionHtml: The lack of a built-in ability to search or filter the options within a <select> element.
entity.descriptionClean: The lack of a built-in ability to search or filter the options within a <select> element.

entity.name: Form validation
entity.description: Set of HTML attributes and JS APIs to facilitate client-side form validation (`<input pattern>`, `<input required>`, `input. setCustomValidity(msg)` etc)
entity.descriptionHtml: Set of HTML attributes and JS APIs to facilitate client-side form validation (<input pattern>, <input required>, input. setCustomValidity(msg) etc)
entity.descriptionClean: Set of HTML attributes and JS APIs to facilitate client-side form validation (<input pattern>, <input required>, input. setCustomValidity(msg) etc)

example.codeHighlighted: <input id="zip" pattern="[0-9]{5}" title="5 digits" required />

entity.name: Validation Errors
entity.description: Pain points related to the UA-generated validation errors. For issues with styling and customizing the content of built-in error messages, combine with `styling_customization` or its descendants.
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points related to the UA-generated validation errors. For issues with styling and customizing the content of built-in error messages, combine with styling_customization or its descendants.
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points related to the UA-generated validation errors. For issues with styling and customizing the content of built-in error messages, combine with styling_customization or its descendants.

entity.name: Cross-Field Validation
entity.description: Difficulties in implementing validation logic where the validity of one field depends on the value of another field.
entity.descriptionHtml: Difficulties in implementing validation logic where the validity of one field depends on the value of another field.
entity.descriptionClean: Difficulties in implementing validation logic where the validity of one field depends on the value of another field.

entity.name: Validation API
entity.description: Issues with the programmatic aspects of the Constraint Validation API (e.g., `setCustomValidity()`).
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues with the programmatic aspects of the Constraint Validation API (e.g., setCustomValidity()).
entity.descriptionClean: Issues with the programmatic aspects of the Constraint Validation API (e.g., setCustomValidity()).

entity.name: Pickers
entity.description: Pain points related to the UI that "picks" a value for an input, such as a calendar or color swatch.
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points related to the UI that "picks" a value for an input, such as a calendar or color swatch.
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points related to the UI that "picks" a value for an input, such as a calendar or color swatch.

entity.name: Date Picker
entity.description: Pain points related to `<input type="date">` and its associated picker UI.
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points related to <input type="date"> and its associated picker UI.
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points related to <input type="date"> and its associated picker UI.

entity.name: Missing elements
entity.description: The need to build common UI patterns from scratch due to the lack of built-in, accessible HTML elements.
entity.descriptionHtml: The need to build common UI patterns from scratch due to the lack of built-in, accessible HTML elements.
entity.descriptionClean: The need to build common UI patterns from scratch due to the lack of built-in, accessible HTML elements.

entity.name: Switch Control
entity.description: The lack of a native switch or toggle control, forcing developers to build one from a checkbox.
entity.descriptionHtml: The lack of a native switch or toggle control, forcing developers to build one from a checkbox.
entity.descriptionClean: The lack of a native switch or toggle control, forcing developers to build one from a checkbox.

entity.name: Tabs element
entity.description: Pain points from the lack of a native HTML element for tabbed interfaces, a common UI pattern.
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points from the lack of a native HTML element for tabbed interfaces, a common UI pattern.
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points from the lack of a native HTML element for tabbed interfaces, a common UI pattern.

entity.name: Carousel
entity.description: The lack of a native, declarative HTML element for creating carousels or sliders, forcing developers to build them from scratch.
entity.descriptionHtml: The lack of a native, declarative HTML element for creating carousels or sliders, forcing developers to build them from scratch.
entity.descriptionClean: The lack of a native, declarative HTML element for creating carousels or sliders, forcing developers to build them from scratch.

entity.name: Interop issues
entity.description: Browser support issues, implementation bugs, cross‑browser implementation differences or inconsistencies, browser prioritization, speed of adoption of new features, any issues where specific browsers, browser engines, or browser companies are mentioned (and it’s not to praise them).
entity.descriptionHtml: Browser support issues, implementation bugs, cross‑browser implementation differences or inconsistencies, browser prioritization, speed of adoption of new features, any issues where specific browsers, browser engines, or browser companies are mentioned (and it’s not to praise them).
entity.descriptionClean: Browser support issues, implementation bugs, cross‑browser implementation differences or inconsistencies, browser prioritization, speed of adoption of new features, any issues where specific browsers, browser engines, or browser companies are mentioned (and it’s not to praise them).

entity.name: Customizable Select
entity.description: Stylable, customizable dropdown control. Previously `<selectlist>` and `<selectmenu>`.
entity.descriptionHtml: Stylable, customizable dropdown control. Previously <selectlist> and <selectmenu>.
entity.descriptionClean: Stylable, customizable dropdown control. Previously <selectlist> and <selectmenu>.

resources.title: The selectmenu HTML Tag | CSS-Tricks - CSS-Tricks
Advanced Form Control Styling With Selectmenu And Anchoring API — Smashing Magazine

webFeature.description_html: The <select> element's appearance, including the button, selected option, picker dropdown, and options, can be customized using CSS.
webFeature.name: Customizable <select>

entity.name: Input Masking
entity.description: The lack of a native feature for formatting user input in real-time, such as for phone numbers or currency.
entity.descriptionHtml: The lack of a native feature for formatting user input in real-time, such as for phone numbers or currency.
entity.descriptionClean: The lack of a native feature for formatting user input in real-time, such as for phone numbers or currency.

entity.name: Input Groups (Prefix/Suffix)
entity.description: Pain points related to the inability to declaratively add prefixes or suffixes (text or icons) inside or alongside an input field, such as for currency symbols or units.
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points related to the inability to declaratively add prefixes or suffixes (text or icons) inside or alongside an input field, such as for currency symbols or units.
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points related to the inability to declaratively add prefixes or suffixes (text or icons) inside or alongside an input field, such as for currency symbols or units.

entity.name: Form Submission
entity.description: Pain points related to the process of submitting form data.
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points related to the process of submitting form data.
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points related to the process of submitting form data.

entity.name: HTTP Methods
entity.description: The limitation of `<form>` elements to only support GET and POST methods, lacking support for PUT, PATCH, DELETE, etc.
entity.descriptionHtml: The limitation of <form> elements to only support GET and POST methods, lacking support for PUT, PATCH, DELETE, etc.
entity.descriptionClean: The limitation of <form> elements to only support GET and POST methods, lacking support for PUT, PATCH, DELETE, etc.

entity.name: JSON form submission
entity.description: The desire for a declarative or built-in way to submit form data as application/json without requiring custom JavaScript to intercept the submission and serialize the data.
entity.descriptionHtml: The desire for a declarative or built-in way to submit form data as application/json without requiring custom JavaScript to intercept the submission and serialize the data.
entity.descriptionClean: The desire for a declarative or built-in way to submit form data as application/json without requiring custom JavaScript to intercept the submission and serialize the data.

entity.name: Accessibility
entity.description: Accessibility improvements
entity.descriptionHtml: Accessibility improvements
entity.descriptionClean: Accessibility improvements

entity.name: Combobox element
entity.description: The lack of a native, accessible combobox element that combines a text input with a dropdown list of suggestions, similar to `<datalist>` but with more control.
entity.descriptionHtml: The lack of a native, accessible combobox element that combines a text input with a dropdown list of suggestions, similar to <datalist> but with more control.
entity.descriptionClean: The lack of a native, accessible combobox element that combines a text input with a dropdown list of suggestions, similar to <datalist> but with more control.

entity.name: Reliance on JavaScript
entity.description: Excessive reliance on JavaScript
entity.descriptionHtml: Excessive reliance on JavaScript
entity.descriptionClean: Excessive reliance on JavaScript

entity.name: Auto-Growing Text Fields
entity.description: The lack of a native, declarative way for a text field (e.g., `<textarea>`) to resize automatically to fit its content.
entity.descriptionHtml: The lack of a native, declarative way for a text field (e.g., <textarea>) to resize automatically to fit its content.
entity.descriptionClean: The lack of a native, declarative way for a text field (e.g., <textarea>) to resize automatically to fit its content.

entity.name: Editing APIs
entity.description: Pain points related to APIs for text editing.
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points related to APIs for text editing.
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points related to APIs for text editing.

entity.name: Editable code
entity.description: Issues around the difficulties using or implementing in-page editable code areas, or wishes there was a native code editor element.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around the difficulties using or implementing in-page editable code areas, or wishes there was a native code editor element.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around the difficulties using or implementing in-page editable code areas, or wishes there was a native code editor element.

entity.name: Markdown editor
entity.description: Issues around the difficulties using or implementing in-page markdown editors, whether that is via contentEditable, textareas, or other methods.
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around the difficulties using or implementing in-page markdown editors, whether that is via contentEditable, textareas, or other methods.
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around the difficulties using or implementing in-page markdown editors, whether that is via contentEditable, textareas, or other methods.

entity.name: radio input
entity.description: Pain points specific to `<input type="radio">`.
entity.descriptionHtml: Pain points specific to <input type="radio">.
entity.descriptionClean: Pain points specific to <input type="radio">.

entity.name: Nullable Radio Inputs
entity.description: The desire for a native way to deselect all radio buttons in a group, allowing for a 'none' or null state without custom JavaScript.
entity.descriptionHtml: The desire for a native way to deselect all radio buttons in a group, allowing for a 'none' or null state without custom JavaScript.
entity.descriptionClean: The desire for a native way to deselect all radio buttons in a group, allowing for a 'none' or null state without custom JavaScript.

entity.name: Autocomplete
entity.description: Autocomplete, comboxbox, typeahead, etc. inputs
entity.descriptionHtml: Autocomplete, comboxbox, typeahead, etc. inputs
entity.descriptionClean: Autocomplete, comboxbox, typeahead, etc. inputs

entity.name: End-user experience
entity.description: Issues around difficulties providing a good user experience for end-users. Do not include DX issues here (use `ergonomics` for that).
entity.descriptionHtml: Issues around difficulties providing a good user experience for end-users. Do not include DX issues here (use ergonomics for that).
entity.descriptionClean: Issues around difficulties providing a good user experience for end-users. Do not include DX issues here (use ergonomics for that).
